0.1.15.en: Icons per device as requested by Athom (created by Athom)

0.1.19.en: HS100, HS110 attempt to prevent stack traces, removal of unnused node modules

0.1.20.en: Another icon fix attempt, Node.JS modules cleanup

0.1.23.en: Fix for HS100 and HS200 - getdrivername is not defined

0.1.25.en: Adding KP105 + logo and other small visual changes

0.1.26.en: Name correction to be inline with Athom rules

0.1.261.en: Experimental - compatibility updates due to the plink-smarthome-api v5

0.2.1.en: Experimental - compatibility updates due to the plink-smarthome-api v5

0.2.5.en: Re-Added registerRunListener (error since SDK3 migration), fixes for Reset meter/Undo reset meter functionality, cleanups

0.2.6.en: drivers sync, attempt to fix some crashes

0.2.8.en: Rework of discovery mechanism, pairing view, allow addition of multiple devices and added HS300(US) multisocket

0.2.11.en: Attempt to randomize polling for HS300 sub-sockets

0.2.20.en: Experimental support of LED light strips KL400,KL430 + added plugs EP10+HS103

0.2.21.en: Experimental support for ES20M dimmer (motion not supported)

0.2.24.en: Small adjustments of getPower and getLED

0.2.25.en: Interval configurable now in device settings (except of HS300)

0.2.26.en: Interval configurable now in device settings (except of HS300)

0.2.27.en: Code optimisation for plug state updates + logging improvements + better handling of bulb brightness

0.2.29.en: Fixes for KP105,HS220 + trying to address isuess with some ES20M devices

0.2.33.en: Another workaround for missing alias on ES20M

0.2.38.en: Disabling KS240 for now (TAPO like, unssuported by API)

0.2.39.en: Pairing process adjusted to get beter name of devices
